name: Alexander Wiebe
description: "AJ is so good at development that sometimes I wonder if he is a terminator sent back in time by skynet to make the war a fair fight" Geremy Lague 2018 Alexander Wiebe AKA AJ was born on January 12, "1987" with a programmable calculator in one hand and a solved rubik's cube in the other. With roots in QBasic he's been coding ever since. Born and raised in the prairies AJ is a local grad from U of R. While he loves his wife and daughter; JavaScript is his passion. AJ's experience involves N-Tier Enterprise apps, rewriting a rowing machine's driver in typescript, and everything in between.
